properties.entry: SELECT COUPON_NAME, COUPON_ENDDATE, COUPON_RATIO, (SELECT COUNT(COUPON_NO) FROM TB_MEMBER_COUPON GROUP BY MEM_NO) "MEMBER_COUPON_COUNT" FROM TB_COUPON C JOIN TB_MEMBER_COUPON MC USING (COUPON_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M USING(MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND COUPON_AVAIL = 'Y' AND MEMBER_COUPON_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_COUPON_DATE DESC
